Our experience with Dr. Garima Maan has been very friendly, like a family member.  When we first went to her for the check-up, there were multiple questions, we were excited and at the same time bit anxious about the journey ahead. But she guided and built the trust so well that we started taking care of little things and got the right tests done at right time with her guidance. Though, both of us (me and my wife) have jobs located in cities away from Delhi but Garima ma'am was approachable all the time.  Her insightful diagnoses and patient-centered approach (seeing past history of medication) ensure comprehensive care. I strongly vouch for her and would recommend if you are looking for top notch care.

I would simply say that we need more and more Doctor like Garima Mam.. 
She is very helpful, friendly and gives full attention to the problems of patient.. 
When I met her first, for my partner, I was nervous about how to approach and get a solution that too with a Gyaneac.. But she calmed me and listened to our problem and gave genuine advice and medicine.. 
She is the best Gyaneac and great human.. Always available for help.. I am absolutely satisfied and happy and strongly recommend everyone.. 
Thank you mam.. 
Would recommend to everyone..

Definitely would recommend her to youngsters out there who are sceptical of visiting a gyneac.
